code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dailyforecast=_ref=>{let{forecastData}=_ref;if(!forecastData||!forecastData.list){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No forecast data available."});}const slicedForecast=forecastData.list.slice(0,5);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dailyforecast",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Daily Forecast"}),slicedForecast.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:new Date(item.dt*1000).toLocaleDateString()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Temperature: ",item.main.temp,"\xB0C"]})]},index))]});};export default Dailyforecast;
